description: Coordination sequence for 4-dimensional RR-centered di-isohexagonal orthogonal lattice.
references: M. O'Keeffe, Coordination sequences for lattices, Zeit. f. Krist., 210 (1995), 905-908.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
maple: [ seq( 11*k^3+7*k, k=1..40 ) ]; # apart from the first term
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 18, 102, 318,732]; [n le 5 select I[n] else 4*Self(n-1)-6*Self(n-2)+4*Self(n-3)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 19 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
